directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in medium bowl; gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper.
Arrange tomatoes on platter. Sprinkle with olives and cheese. Drizzle with enough dressing to coat. Serve, passing remaining dressing separately.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano or 2 teaspoons dried
1/3 cup Kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives, pitted, chopped
title: Tomatoes and Feta Cheese with Herb-and-Garlic Dressing
